Hovnanian Why Wylder Amenities & Lifestyle Gallery FAQ HOA fees Blog Video Tour Schedule a Tour Realtors Floorplans 305-3427413 ASTOR CREEK GOLF & COUNTRY CLUB Astor Creek Golf & Country Club: Premier Living in Port St. Lucie Astor Creek Golf & Country Club is an exclusive, gated community located in the heart of Port St. Lucie, Florida. This premier golf course community is designed for those who seek a modern, luxurious country club lifestyle with world-class amenities and beautiful surroundings. Community Overview Astor Creek is renowned for its picturesque landscapes and a challenging 18-hole championship golf course designed by Christopher Wilczynski. The community features approximately 900 homes, all crafted with contemporary designs and high-end finishes, providing residents with both comfort and elegance. Amenities Residents of Astor Creek Golf & Country Club enjoy an array of top-tier amenities, including: Clubhouse : The 1566 Club, which includes dining rooms, a bar, a golf shop, men‚Äôs and women‚Äôs locker rooms, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. Outdoor Pool : A stunning resort-style pool with cabanas for ultimate relaxation. Sports Courts : Tennis, pickleball, bocce, and basketball courts are available for all sports enthusiasts. Golf Course : A signature 18-hole golf course featuring forgiving fairways and a playable landscape, perfect for golfers of all skill levels. Practice Facilities : A 15-acre grass driving range, a 3-acre short game complex, and a 15,000 sq. ft. practice putting green Lifestyle and Activities Astor Creek fosters a vibrant community atmosphere with numerous activities and social events throughout the year. Whether you enjoy golfing, swimming, fitness classes, or social gatherings, there‚Äôs always something to do. The community also hosts tournaments and outings, making it a perfect place for both relaxation and active living. Location and Accessibility Located conveniently near I-95 and Florida‚Äôs Turnpike, Astor Creek provides easy access to the Treasure Coast‚Äôs best shopping, dining, and recreational options. The community is just 25 minutes from the beach and 40 minutes north of the Palm Beaches, offering residents both tranquility and convenience. Homes and Real Estate Astor Creek features a variety of luxurious homes with options for 2 to 6 bedrooms. The homes are designed with open floor plans, spacious family kitchens, and large windows that bring in plenty of natural light. Many models include flex rooms, ideal for home offices or playrooms, and second-floor bonus rooms that can be customized as home gyms, extra bedrooms, or in-law suites. Here are some of the popular models: Jordan : 2,732 Total Sq. Ft., 2 Bedroom (up to 4 Bedroom), Flex Room, 2 Bath, Great Room, 2-Car Garage. Starting Price $506,990. Katherine : 2,753 Total Sq. Plan a Visit to Astor Creek Step into the luxurious lifestyle of Astor Creek Golf & Country Club by planning a visit. Explore the beautifully designed homes and world-class amenities that make this community truly exceptional. To schedule your tour or to explore similar new construction communities, contact us at 305-342-7413 or email [email¬†protected] . HOA Fees As of April 2024, the HOA fees in Astor Creek range from $260 to $280 per month. These fees cover a variety of services and amenities that help maintain the community‚Äôs high standards. For specific information on the current HOA fees, please get in touch with our team. Worked at Cellar in Sky World Trade Center, Sheraton Corporation, Junior League of Houston, Bon Appetite, Lakeside Country Club and Bay Oaks Country Club.Over Thirty years in Food Service13years as a Invited Employee.Team member Texas Chefs Association George W Bush Presidential inauguration reception, Economic Summit Rice University.Culinary Institute of America ‚Äì Culinary Team Member25 years as a member Houston Livestock Show & Rodeo, Chairman 2 timeWife Tracy, son Gregory, Daughter ElizabethStarted at the Woodlands CC in February Contact Me Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Contact Me Jesse.Regalado Contact Me + Close Jesse Regalado information modal Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Serving since 2022 Jesse.Regalado Jesse.Regalado Contact Me Contact Me Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Contact Me 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber + Close Amber Sickafoose information modal Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Serving since 2010 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber Amber holds a BS degree in Marketing from Bellevue University. She started her career as a Director of Marketing for a financial company but quickly decided that sales was her real passion. Her golf career began in 2009 for The Woodlands Country Club as a membership director for both The Oaks and Panther Trail courses as well as The Woodlands Country Club courses. She is a very active member in the community and a graduate of Leadership Montgomery County class of 2013. Contact Me Jason Lippy Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason + Close Jason Lippy information modal Jason Lippy Membership Director Serving since 2015 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason Jason comes to Indian Wells Country Club by way of Desert Falls Country Club in Palm Desert, where he spent the four years as General Manager / Membership Director. Before moving to California in 2015, Jason spent the previous 12 years working as General Manager / Membership Director for Glen Oaks Country Club, a Invited Affiliate Club in Louisville, Kentucky. 

Jason has worked in the golf business his entire career, starting in the Golf Shop at The Polo Fields Country Club when he was only 16.  He then moved to Glenmary Country Club to join the Membership Sales Department. Eventually becoming Club Manager at Glenmary Country Club.  Jason is a graduate of Western Kentucky University‚Äôs Broadcasting Department and has also worked covering college basketball and football for ESPN.  Jason‚Äôs interests include playing golf, spending time with his wife and eight year old daughter exploring the Coachella Valley. Contact Me Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell + Close Mitchell Putnam information modal Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Serving since 2014 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell Email:¬† Mitchell.Putnam@clubcorp.comMitchell holds a BS degree in Criminal Justice from Sam Houston State University. He was born and raised in Houston Texas. He joined the Invited family as Service Captain at Willow Creek Golf Club in 2014, eventually becoming the Membership Director in 2017. He joined The Golf Trails of The Woodlands team in 2018 as the Membership Director.¬†He enjoys playing golf, fishing, and watching Houston sports teams play. Contact Me Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-801-4103 Annemarie.Mckay Contact Me About Annemarie + Close Annemarie McKay information modal Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Serving since 2015 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay Contact Me About Annemarie Annemarie is originally from Allen, Tx. She holds a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Hospitality Administration from Stephen F. Austin State University, located in the small town of Nacogdoches, Texas. Annemarie started her career with Invited as a college intern at Stonebriar Country Club in Frisco, Tx. After she graduated, she was hired on fulltime as their Private Event Coordinator assisting with corporate and social events. Annemarie then moved forward in here career and stepped into the role of Private Event Manager at the Las Colinas Country Club in Irving, Tx. There she continued to build her range of events and added Golf Tournaments to her portfolio. She had the privilege of working on events such as George W. Bush Presidential Center‚Äôs Warrior Open and the 2015 Volunteers of America North Texas LPGA Shootout. Annemarie recently moved to Houston to further pursue her passion for private events and is proud to call the Woodlands Country Club home, as their Private Event Director. Contact Me Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke + Close Brooke Tyler information modal Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Serving since 2009 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke Brooke Tyler is a graduate of The University of Texas at Arlington with a degree in Public Relations. She moved to the Houston Area in 2004 where she started her career in the hospitality industry. She worked for Marriott International for five years as an Event Manager planning various events ranging from corporate, social, to weddings. She began her career at The Woodlands Country Club in 2009 as an Event Manager where she planned Member Events, Member Association Events and Golf Tournaments. In 2012, she took over the Private Event Manager role where she focused on selling and executing all private events for The Woodlands Country Club. She has had the pleasure of working with many members, clients and brides to successfully implement their event. Some of her most favorite memories have been made at The Country Club. She has made some of her closest friendships while working here, as well as meeting her husband, Wes. Astor Creek Golf & Country Club - Taylor Morrison Coming soon to Astor Creek Golf & Country Club in Port St. Lucie, Florida, are new homes by Taylor Morrison. Located west of I-95, north of Tradition, this luxurious gated community features an 18-hole golf course designed by Chris Wylczynski, as well as a premier clubhouse with a restaurant and bar. Additionally, amenities will include a state of the art fitness center, powered by E-Gym, pickleball, tennis, resort-style pool and more. Astor Creek is planned to have about 900 homesites with single family homes located on more private landscape views, water and golf course views.¬†In addition to Kolter Homes offering personalized floor plans with over 40 structural options, Taylor Morrison will bring single-story floor plans with 150 homesites, also offering unique designs and selections to add to this luxurious golf course community. Taylor Morrison is a national home builder and more locally known for its Esplanade brand in the 55+ community Esplanade at Tradition . The 18-hole hole championship golf course is currently open offering annual memberships to non-residents and included memberships to Astor Creek residents with full family golf privileges. Members also have access to to the golf shop, 15-acre grass driving range, 3-acre short game complex, and a 15,000 sq. ft. practice putting green. Homes prices to be determined. View models available at Astor Creek by Taylor Morrison Join the Interest List! If you are interested in similar communities or new construction communities starting now, contact us at 772-301-8524. Astor Creek Golf & Country Club Astor Creek Golf & Country Club is an all new premier gated, golf course community located in Port St. Lucie, Florida located just west of PGA Verano, also a product of Kolter Homes. Astor Creek Port St Lucie Homes For Sale include new construction single family homes that are all one-story floor plans, with an optional second floor bonus room, situated on beautifully landscaped golf course and water views. Kolter focuses on personalization where there are over 40 structural options you can customize to fit you and your family's needs.In addition to Kolter Homes, new homes are coming soon to Astor Creek Golf & Country Club by Taylor Morrison . Currently, there is a $0 initiation fee when purchasing a home in Astor Creek with full access to the golf course, clubhouse with resort style amenities including a restaurant and bar. A lifestyle director is on site to coordinate social events along with a sports director with tennis and pickleball. The new 18-hole golf course is the first golf course community to be developed from the ground up by Kolter and designed by architect Chris Wilczynski. Residents have full family golf privileges to the golf shop, 15-acre grass driving range, 3-acre short game complex, and a 15,000 sq. ft. practice putting green. Memberships are available for non-residents. With a total of 682 acres, there will be roughly 900 new homes planned inside this exclusive community ranging from 2 to 6 bedrooms and 1,968 to 5,000+ living square feet. Astor Creek's clubhouse, The 1566 Club, will feature a full bar and restaurant, fitness center powered by EGYM, resort style pool, tennis, pickleball and more. Home prices start from $506,900 not including the homesite or design upgrades. Call 772-301-8524 to learn about $0 lot premiums and incentives towards upgrade options. Full Model Home Video Tours at Astor Creek If you are interested in similar communities or new construction communities starting now, contact us at 772-301-8524. Photos Schedule Your Tour Membership Return to Clubhouse & Lifestyle We understand a great golf experience is as much about the people as it is the course design and conditioning. Whether a Resident or Invitational member, the Astor Creek golf membership experience is grounded in hospitality with a goal to create camaraderie. Beyond great play, a full-time Lifestyle Coordinator is focused on planning and executing social events, activities and programs that create connection between members and fun for all. For Astor Creek new home buyers, club membership is included.
